pages.title: String to Integer
pages.idea: Subtract '0' to get digit value, multiply accumulator by 10, add digit.
pages.code:
result = 0
for c in string:
    digit = c - '0'
    result = result * 10 + digit
return result

pages.title: Reverse Integer
pages.idea: Extract last digit repeatedly and build result
pages.code:
result = 0
while n > 0:
    digit = n % 10
    result = result * 10 + digit
    n = n // 10

pages.title: Check Prime
pages.idea: Divide up to √n and check for factors
pages.code:
if n < 2: return false
for i in 2..sqrt(n):
    if n % i == 0: return false
return true
